divs: Sighting DetailsAt first we thought it was a planet most likely venus. It was very bright and pulsating red, white and blue. At first it didn't move stayig where it was for at least 30 minutes, then it moved right slowly before taking off quickly into the distance and disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Providence
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: it was pulsating red white and blue.
